categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Farsal was a male Human who served as a private in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the invasion of the planet Taris, he was stationed at the Toxic Lake Garrison.
Private Farsal first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the Crew Skill Trade Vendor for the Empire on Taris.
